channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- DCGM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- DCGM

item.title: CVE-2023-0208|2024-08-02T05:02:44.011Z -- nvidia -- dcgm
item.description: NVIDIA DCGM for Linux contains a vulnerability in HostEngine (server component) where a user may cause a heap-based buffer overflow through the bound socket. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to denial of service and data tampering.
